text:
<@UK1BNFHFV> for Chain.jl.

It's a really nice example of having existing workflows that were limiting, someone coming along and understanding the pain points, and creating a really nice solution that fills all needs. See this issue in DataFramesMeta recently: <https://github.com/JuliaData/DataFramesMeta.jl/issues/232>
